dc:description: Blue fragment is slightly curves, small and rectangular. Small green fragment is flat and triangular with two bands of gilding inside the glass. Large green fragment is roughly flat and rectangular with one long side rounded unevenly, and the other long side curving up slightly. Probably part of the rim of a bowl or plate.
